question: How many data scientists are currently hired by companies that have recently entered new vendor agreements for AI solutions?

subtasks.task: Identify companies that have recently entered vendor agreements for AI solutions. [CompanyDealMaster, CompanyVendorProductDetail]
Filter the vendor agreements to focus specifically on AI solutions. [CompanyVendorProductDetail]
Count the number of data scientists hired by the identified companies. [CompanyHiringDetail]
